pkgmetadata.longdescription: Colour Vision Models // Colour vision models, colour spaces and colour thresholds. Provides flexibility to build user-defined colour vision models for n number of photoreceptor types. Also includes Vorobyev Osorio (1998) Receptor Noise Limited models, Chittka (1992) colour hexagon, and Endler Mielke (2005) model. Models have been extended to accept any number of photoreceptor types.
